function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Community-led development practices may facilitate spread of COVID-19 due to in-person contact with high-risk groups.","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19 within communities.","Mitigation":"Adaptation of community organization processes to adhere to physical distancing guidelines and minimize in-person contact with high-risk groups.","Technologies":"Virtual communication platforms like WhatsApp or Facebook groups for mobilization.","People":"Community members, especially high-risk groups such as the elderly and immunocompromised.","Owner":"Community leaders, organizers, and stakeholders."},{"Description":"Misinformation and rumors spread through radio and social media may foster confusion, distrust, or panic within the community.","Impact":"Decreased trust in public health information and guidelines, leading to non-compliance and increased risk of transmission.","Mitigation":"Establishment of credible communication channels to manage misinformation and rumors, and promotion of accurate public health information.","Technologies":"Radio broadcasts and social media platforms for sharing accurate information.","People":"Community members, especially those who rely on radio and social media for information.","Owner":"Local authorities, community leaders, and public health organizations."},{"Description":"Ineffective settlement-wide quarantines during the Ebola outbreak led to violence and were ultimately abandoned.","Impact":"Potential for violence and community unrest if similar quarantine measures are implemented for COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implementation of individual and household-level isolation and quarantine measures instead of settlement-wide quarantines.","Technologies":"Monitoring technology for tracking and ensuring compliance with individual and household-level quarantine measures.","People":"Community members, especially those affected by quarantine measures.","Owner":"Local authorities, public health agencies, and community leaders."}]}
